original_text: When they had their own kingdom, they still would not agree to serve you. You gave them a good land to live in, with plenty of food. They enjoyed your good gifts, but they would not obey you. They did not stop doing evil things.
korean_text: 그들이 그 나라와 주께서 그들에게 베푸신 큰 복과 자기 앞에 주신 넓고 기름진 땅을 누리면서도 주를 섬기지 아니하며 악행을 그치지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: When they had their own kingdom
they still would not agree to serve you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여전히 당신을 섬기기로 동의하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: You gave them a good land to live in
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 살기 좋은 땅을 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: but they would not obey you
They did not stop doing evil things
